zh-CN.系统在4s内自动跳转至登录页，您可以选择直接: 系统在4s内自动跳转至登录页，您可以选择直接

en-US.请再次输入新密码: Please enter the new password again
en-US.您已成功修改密码，请重新登录!: You have successfully modified your password. Please sign in again!
en-US.系统在4s内自动跳转至登录页，您可以选择直接: The system will automatically jump to the login page within 4s, and you can select it directly
en-US.手机号不能为空: Phone number can not be empty
en-US.验证码不能为空: verification code can not be empty
en-US.新密码不能为空: The new password can not be empty
en-US.密码需包含字母、数字，且长度不小于6位: The password shall contain letters, numbers and lengths of not less than 6 digits
en-US.重复新密码不能为空: Duplicate new password can not be empty
